urls.title: Home | Tony's Towing Trivia
urls.description: Sadly, not all of it is true. The problem is sorting fact from fiction and mere opinions. Hopefully, in these pages, I can help sort the wheat from the chaff, the truth from misinformation and hearsay, and bust a few myths along the way. Although still an active tower and motorhome user, I have no connexion or affiliations with any companies or organisations. My primary concern is Safe & Legal towing. My experience relates specifically to cat01 and 02 trailers. Cat01 trailers are unbraked, up tp 750kgs

@MrAndy_Carter @EnvAgency @johncurtinEA @WarringtonBC I lived in Dallam from 2014-2016 on Charter Avenue, we were flooded Boxing Day 2015. Time after time the environment agency were told about the dangers of flooding but did nothing

I‚Äôve been in #Dallam again today meeting with @EnvAgency  @johncurtinEA and @WarringtonBC to look at steps needed to protect homes follow the Sankey brook bursting this time banks last week. Pleased to hear a scheme already under consideration. https://t.co/ksGaVOHWun

text: @InnesThomson @DefraGovUK @hmtreasury @EnvAgency @MoretonBack1 @JamesBevanEA @johncurtinEA Farmers working together to manage their rivers was tested as a pilot in the Brue catchment after the summer 2012 floods, without success.

Our @EnvAgencyNW Pump Team met with @johncurtinEA this morning at Didsbury Flood Storage Reservoir. We‚Äôve been pumping 24/7 reducing levels from 95% to <20% in less than a week. This will make sure we are ready for the next storm - hopefully not anytime soon!#TeamEA #PumpAction https://t.co/Lee4eSad2C
@AgainstSewage @SteveCJjones @EnvAgency They'd be better installing a reed bed in the garden, if they do not have a septic tank. Absolutely no excuse for allowing this to happen nowadays.
